worklogs.comment:
liyafan82 commented on pull request #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097
 
 
   Improve some operations in bit_util:
   
   1. Eliminate one division for CeilDiv
   2. Avoid overflow for RoundUp
   3. Add a utility for CeilDiv(value, 8)

liyafan82 commented on issue #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#issuecomment-569201554
 
 
   By dealing with the problem of overflow, another problem is introduced: 
   
   (value - 1) / factor + 1 
   
   does not work correctly when value == 0. So we have restored it to:
   
   (value + factor - 1) / factor
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the

users@infra.apache.org

liyafan82 commented on issue #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#issuecomment-569201554
 
 
   By dealing with the problem of overflow, another problem is introduced: 
   
   (value - 1) / factor + 1 
   
   does not work correctly when value == 0. So we have revised it accordingly, with the extra overhead of a setnz instruction. 
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

liyafan82 commented on issue #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#issuecomment-569201554
 
 
   By dealing with the problem of overflow, another problem is introduced: 
   
   (value - 1) / factor + 1 
   
   does not work correctly when value == 0. So we have revised it to work for 0, by means of a setnz instruction.

pitrou commented on pull request #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#discussion_r363726224
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/util/bit_util.h
 ##########
 @@ -116,7 +119,7 @@ static constexpr uint8_t kBytePopcount[] = {
 
 // Returns the ceil of value/divisor
 constexpr int64_t CeilDiv(int64_t value, int64_t divisor) {
-  return value / divisor + (value % divisor != 0);
+  return SETNE(value) + (value - SETNE(value)) / divisor;
 
 Review comment:
   This seems needlessly obscure to me. Would the following work instead?
   ```cpp
     return (value == 0) ? 0 : 1 + (value - 1) / divisor;
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

pitrou commented on pull request #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#discussion_r363727691
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/util/bit_util.h
 ##########
 @@ -151,7 +154,7 @@ constexpr bool IsMultipleOf8(int64_t n) { return (n & 7) == 0; }
 
 // Returns 'value' rounded up to the nearest multiple of 'factor'
 constexpr int64_t RoundUp(int64_t value, int64_t factor) {
-  return (value + (factor - 1)) / factor * factor;
+  return ((value - SETNE(value)) / factor + SETNE(value)) * factor;
 
 Review comment:
   It seems this is exactly the same as:
   ```cpp
     return CeilDiv(value, factor) * factor;
   ```
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

liyafan82 commented on pull request #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#discussion_r364072573
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/util/bit_util.h
 ##########
 @@ -116,7 +119,7 @@ static constexpr uint8_t kBytePopcount[] = {
 
 // Returns the ceil of value/divisor
 constexpr int64_t CeilDiv(int64_t value, int64_t divisor) {
-  return value / divisor + (value % divisor != 0);
+  return SETNE(value) + (value - SETNE(value)) / divisor;
 
 Review comment:
   @pitrou Thanks a lot for your comments.
   
   Your suggested code really works and is much clearer. 
   I am just concerned that it will create a branch in the instruction and affect performance. 
   
   What is your opinion about this?
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/util/bit_util.h
 ##########
 @@ -151,7 +154,7 @@ constexpr bool IsMultipleOf8(int64_t n) { return (n & 7) == 0; }
 
 // Returns 'value' rounded up to the nearest multiple of 'factor'
 constexpr int64_t RoundUp(int64_t value, int64_t factor) {
-  return (value + (factor - 1)) / factor * factor;
+  return ((value - SETNE(value)) / factor + SETNE(value)) * factor;
 
 Review comment:
   Good point. Revised accordingly.

liyafan82 commented on pull request #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#discussion_r364202340
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/util/bit_util.h
 ##########
 @@ -116,7 +119,7 @@ static constexpr uint8_t kBytePopcount[] = {
 
 // Returns the ceil of value/divisor
 constexpr int64_t CeilDiv(int64_t value, int64_t divisor) {
-  return value / divisor + (value % divisor != 0);
+  return SETNE(value) + (value - SETNE(value)) / divisor;
 
 Review comment:
   I have added a simple benchmark. The result shows that there are some overhead with the tertiary operator:
   
   The setnz version:
   CeilDev                                       554 ns          555 ns      1262719 items_per_second=100.969M/s
   
   The tertiary operation version:
   CeilDev                                       642 ns          643 ns      1000000 items_per_second=87.1129M/s
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

pitrou commented on pull request #6097: ARROW-7469: [C++] Improve division related bit operations
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6097#discussion_r364238891
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/util/bit_util.h
 ##########
 @@ -116,7 +119,7 @@ static constexpr uint8_t kBytePopcount[] = {
 
 // Returns the ceil of value/divisor
 constexpr int64_t CeilDiv(int64_t value, int64_t divisor) {
-  return value / divisor + (value % divisor != 0);
+  return SETNE(value) + (value - SETNE(value)) / divisor;
 
 Review comment:
   Sorry, there was a misunderstanding. I don't think we care about micro-benchmarking `CeilDiv`. What I was asking was whether there was an existing benchmark or workload where you saw a difference.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

 constexpr int64_t CeilDiv(int64_t value, int64_t divisor) {
-  return value / divisor + (value % divisor != 0);
+  return SETNE(value) + (value - SETNE(value)) / divisor;
 
 Review comment:
   @pitrou Sorry I misunderstood your point. The microbenchmark has been removed. 
   
   I ran bit_util_benchmark, and found no notable change:
   
   Benchmark    setne impl    tertiary impl
   VisitBits/8192  116.806M/s      116.342M/s
   VisitBitsUnrolled/8192  319.859M/s      317.137M/s
   BitmapWriter/8192       81.4389M/s      80.8341M/s
   FirstTimeBitmapWriter/8192      87.3256M/s      87.0754M/s
   GenerateBits/8192       81.1347M/s      81.0713M/s
   GenerateBitsUnrolled/8192       138.403M/s      128.731M/s
   CopyBitmapWithoutOffset/8192    38.871G/s       39.4095G/s
   CopyBitmapWithOffset/8192       638.879M/s      638.865M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/32768/0      4.78202G/s      4.77886G/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/131072/0     4.77979G/s      4.78636G/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/32768/0      4.77655G/s      4.77886G/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/131072/0     4.78616G/s      4.77806G/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/32768/1      17.5473M/s      17.5703M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/131072/1     17.5653M/s      17.5669M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/32768/2      17.699M/s       17.6438M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapAnd/131072/2     17.7274M/s      17.6017M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/32768/0   23.1401M/s      23.1495M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/131072/0  23.1276M/s      23.1548M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/32768/0   23.1153M/s      23.1555M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/131072/0  23.1378M/s      23.1376M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/32768/1   23.0758M/s      23.1538M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/131072/1  23.1484M/s      23.1581M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/32768/2   23.1425M/s      23.1426M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitBitsetAnd/131072/2  23.1366M/s      23.1431M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/32768/0    677.893M/s      679.319M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/131072/0   681.277M/s      679.301M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/32768/0    684.623M/s      681.35M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/131072/0   678.489M/s      678.842M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/32768/1    301.361M/s      302.237M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/131072/1   303.976M/s      304.196M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/32768/2    300.889M/s      301.587M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt8And/131072/2   304.244M/s      304.374M/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt64And/32768/0   2.71933G/s      2.71748G/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt64And/131072/0  2.70706G/s      2.72068G/s
   BenchmarkBitmapVisitUInt64And/32768/0   2.70293G/s      2.69589G/s

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
Improve some operations in bit_util:

1. Eliminate one division for CeilDiv
2. Avoid overflow for RoundUp
3. Add a utility for CeilDiv(value, 8)
